text: Article 7 (Matters concerning the installation, operation and refusal of automatic personal information collection devices) 1 Riv Technology uses 'cookies' that store and retrieve usage information from time to time to provide personalized services to users.

1 <Riv Technology> processes and retains personal information within the period of retention and use of personal information according to the law or the period of use and retention of personal information agreed upon when collecting personal information from the information subject.
Article 1 (Purpose of Personal Information Processing) <Riv Technology> (' www.classshare.co.kr ' or 'classShare') processes personal information for the following purposes.
Article 1 (Purpose of Personal Information Processing) <Riv Technology> (' www.classshare.co.kr ' or 'classShare') processes personal information for the following purposes.

Confirmation of intention to sign up for membership, identification/authentication of members by providing membership services, maintenance/management of membership, prevention of illegal use of services, confirmation of consent of legal representatives when processing personal information of children under the age of 14, various notices/notifications, grievance handling We process personal data for this purpose.
